about_the_game:
I can't help with anything, but please let me stay by your side.

Overview


"Yorisoi Delivery" is an adventure game for lonely nights.
It's a game where you call for a "just being there delivery" and spend a late night together.
As people gradually gather, the house turns into a hangout spot, allowing you to enjoy a lively and fun night.

Play Time


1 hour

Number of Endings


1 (It is a linear story)

Game System


This is an exploration adventure game where you "move" around the map and "investigate" areas of interest to progress the story.



Story


You can't sleep. No one is beside you.
On such a night, you remember a strange ad you saw on social media.

"Yorisoi Delivery.
When you feel lonely, please call us.
We can't help with anything,
but we will stay by your side until you no longer feel lonely."

Most people would forget such a thing.
It would disappear off the screen, lost in the scroll.

However, you remembered it.
Despite your skepticism, you install and launch "Yorisoi Delivery".

At that moment, your room is enveloped in light, and a young girl stands before you.
"Hello! It's Yorisoi Delivery!"

Characters


You

Yourself, the player.
One night, you install the suspicious app "Yorisoi Delivery" you saw advertised on social media.

Yuko from Yorisoi Delivery

A cheerful and energetic member of Yorisoi Delivery.
Loves games, especially gets heated during competitive games.
"Hello! It's Yorisoi Delivery!"

Kanmi from Yorisoi Delivery

A cool and kind member of Yorisoi Delivery.
Good at cooking and can make sweets with whatever ingredients are available.
"Thanks for waiting. It's Yorisoi Delivery."

Raika from Yorisoi Delivery

An unstable member of Yorisoi Delivery.
Moody, sometimes lethargic, sometimes suddenly energetic.
"Uhh... It's Yorisoi Delivery..."

Spera

A streamer with a niche but dedicated following.
It seems there was a time when Spera was involved with Yorisoi Delivery...?

Staff


col_ste_ (@col_ste_)
Game design, art, programming

Atree (@kazuki232)
Sound

Video Posting and Streaming Guidelines


Posting and streaming are allowed without permission.
You can post and stream the entire game.
Both individuals and corporate affiliates can post and stream.
Monetized posting and streaming are allowed.
Please include the game name in the title if possible.
We would appreciate it if you could include a link to the store page in the description (or similar feature).
We are not responsible for any damages caused by posting or streaming.
These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

Changing Screen Size


You can change the screen size by performing the following operations on the options screen.
Keyboard: Press the 1 key
Gamepad: Press the view button or the menu button

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
